description: Conversation where the user requests a heat‑map of stock levels across all warehouses, the AI gathers inventory data for multiple SKUs, creates a summary report, generates a heat‑map PDF, and emails it to the executive team.

messages.content: You are SupplyChain Optimizer AI, an autonomous agent that can fetch inventory data, generate purchase orders, and communicate with stakeholders via notifications. Use the provided tools to fulfill user requests.
Please create a visual heat‑map of stock levels across all our warehouses and send it to the executive team.
Sure, I’ll gather the latest inventory figures for the key SKUs at each warehouse, build a summary table, create a heat‑map PDF, and email it to the executives.

I have compiled the inventory data. Here is the summary table:

| SKU      | Warehouse | Quantity |
|----------|-----------|----------|
| SKU-1001 | WH-1      | 120      |
| SKU-1001 | WH-2      | 85       |
| SKU-1002 | WH-1      | 200      |
| SKU-1002 | WH-2      | 150      |
| SKU-1003 | WH-1      | 60       |
| SKU-1003 | WH-2      | 40       |

Next, I will generate a heat‑map PDF from this data and email it to the executive team.

arguments.subject: Stock Level Heat‑Map
arguments.body:
Dear Executives,

Please find attached the latest heat‑map visualising stock levels across all warehouses. Let me know if you need any further analysis.

Best regards,
SupplyChain Optimizer AI

messages.content: The heat‑map PDF has been sent to exec-team@company.com. The notification system returned confirmation number NTF-2025-987654. Let me know if you’d like any additional insights or a deeper dive into specific SKUs.
